name: Shadowfang Bow
description: A bow crafted from the bones of ancient dragons, its arrows never miss their mark.

name: Bladesong Sword
description: A sword that hums with a melody of power, striking fear into foes.

name: Eclipse Wand
description: A wand imbued with the essence of a solar eclipse, casting spells of blinding light.

name: Ironwood Longbow
description: A longbow carved from enchanted ironwood, its arrows pierce even the toughest armor.

name: Stormcleaver Sword
description: A massive sword that crackles with the fury of a thunderstorm.

name: Soulpiercer Wand
description: A wand said to channel the despair of lost souls into devastating spells.

name: Phoenix Bow
description: A bow that shoots fiery arrows, igniting enemies with the flames of rebirth.

name: Crystalblade Sword
description: A sword forged from pure crystal, reflecting light in dazzling arcs.

name: Frostshard Wand
description: A wand that summons the biting cold of the Arctic to freeze enemies in their tracks.

name: Dreadhunter Bow
description: A bow crafted to hunt creatures of the dark, glowing faintly in their presence.
